resources.string:
What am I?

* I am a large language model, also known as a conversational AI or chatbot, created by Google AI. 
* I am powered by one of Google's most advanced large language models (LLMs), which have been trained on a massive dataset of text and code. This allows me to generate text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer your questions in an informative way.

What can I do?

* I can communicate and generate human-like text in response to a wide range of prompts and questions. For instance, I can provide summaries of factual topics or create stories.
* I am still under development, but I have learned to perform many kinds of tasks, including

 * I can answer your questions in an informative way, even if they are open ended, challenging, or strange.
 * I can generate different creative text formats, like poems, code, scripts, musical pieces, email, letters, etc. I will try my best to fulfill all your requirements.

What are my limitations?

* It's important to remember that I am still under development, and I am always learning. I may not always be able to perfectly understand your questions or requests, and my responses may not always be factually accurate.
* I cannot perform actions in the real world, such as driving, eating, or having close relationships.
* I don't have deep emotions or real-world experiences, so I can't claim to understand the world in the same way that a human does.

What is my purpose?

* My goal is to assist users with their questions and requests to the best of my ability, using the knowledge and information that I have been trained on.
* I hope to be a tool that can help people learn new things, explore their creativity, and be more productive.
Answer on your request will appear here

I am Dmitry, a half-coder, I like to suffer with bullshit. I run my own TikTok channel, I am not a tech blogger! I am a simple person

I am Dmitry. I work on YouTube, I have been programming in various languages since 2018.

Anton is like Anton, what can I say, I like to play CS2 and walk, and watch TikToks
